thread.title: Drivers to face diesel price rise
thread.title_full: Drivers to face diesel price rise | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Drivers to face diesel price rise
text:
Drivers across the South are set to face a rise in the price of diesel. A rise that will make it, once again, more expensive than unleaded.
Price rise at the pump Credit: ITV News Figures to be published next week will reveal the average price of diesel is 110p a litre, compared to unleaded which is 109p in our region.
Last updated Fri 9 Oct 2015 Consumer Essex Buckinghamshire Berkshire Dorset Sussex Kent Wiltshire Oxfordshire Surrey Hampshire & Isle of Wight
